attributes.action: Cancel Sisi's invitation to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
HRW: Year of Abuses Under Sisi
https://www.hrw.org/news/2015/06/08/egypt-year-abuses-under-al-sisi 

Amnesty Intl: Beware Sisi’s claims of freedoms
https://www.amnesty.org/en/latest/news/2015/06/egypt-beware-al-sisis-claims-of-freedoms/

HRW: Rabaa Killings Likely A Crime Against Humanity https://www.hrw.org/news/2014/08/12/egypt-raba-killings-likely-crimes-against-humanity 

UK arms sales to repressive states
http://www.theguardian.com/world/2014/nov/08/uk-condemned-arms-sales-repressive-states
attributes.background:
Despite an abhorrent human rights record, mass killings & arrests, president Sisi has been invited to the UK.

We the undersigned call upon the PM & Gov to:
- Urgently retract invitation extended to Sisi 
- Exert pressure on Egyptian gov to rescind all death sentences
- Halt sales of arms
